text: Tony McCoy (July 5, 1924 - August 2, 2000) was an American actor. He played police Lt. Craig in Ed Wood's 1956 sci-fi horror movie Bride of the Monster. This movie also starred Bela Lugosi, Tor Johnson, Paul Marco, and Loretta King. Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:1924 births Category:2000 deaths
title: Tony McCoy (actor)
